projects.name: Meditaciones Diarias
projects.description: This is a free app that allows you to listen to hundreds of meditations, ranging from 15 to 30 minutes in duration. I have develop this one for BeeCode.

projects.name: iSmile
projects.description: This is a mobile app that allows you to control your meditation, get quotes and schedule meditation, I have develop this one for BeeCode.

projects.name: Youth Zone | Final Year Project
projects.description: This is a mobile app with an advanced web dashboard where users can make friends, chat with friends, join competitions, challenge friends, enroll in free courses, and much more. I am looking forward to finding a sponsor for this project and making it live. Feel free to contact me if you are interested! :)

projects.name: Larkhod Educational Website and mobile Application
projects.description: This is an education platform that is developed through it Afghan school students can learn and access all school books
